entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carberry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carberry 03:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -29.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -32.2°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
